Claim: "People walk on a sidewalk in front of a Hyatt."
Implication: "There are people walking in front of a hotel."
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsWalkingOn(a,b) and IsInFrontOf(a,c)))) & (forall e (forall f (forall g (  IsInFrontOf(e,f) ->  IsWalkingInFrontOf(e,g))))) & (forall j (forall h (forall i ( IsWalkingInFrontOf(h,i) ->   IsInFrontOf(h,j)))))) -> (exists a (exists d (IsWalkingInFrontOf(a,d))))
